name: The Crystal Nebula
description: Fly your spaceship from wormhole to wormhole, navigating dangerous space station obstacle courses and collecting crystals from the wreckage of fallen enemies. The Crystal Nebula demands your highest dexterity and accuracy in order to shoot and dodge your way through its waves of opposition!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 - 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 760 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I don't understand these positive reviews and i don't recommend it. I believe it is easier with a bigger room but still...usually i like hard games but not this one. It is insanely hard from the start and i have not enjoyed it at all and just raged again and again at how much the dev is trolling us.  I would recommend it if it wasn't so hard from the start but don't buy it except if insanely hard games is your thing
